| History                 = Obsidian Industries was suspected to be one of the biotech companies that used [[Laura Kinney (Earth-616)|X-23]]'s DNA to make clones. After a supposedly annonymous tip-off, X-23 and [[Gabrielle Kinney (Earth-616)|Scout]] snuck into one of their buildings to check for clones. They were ambushed by security guards, and while trying escape, came into a room with many children locked inside. X-23 deduced that the organization was probably getting a heavy government contract to hold the children, and with Scout's help, freed them and drove them away.{{r|Fearless Vol 1 2}}
